newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Rubbermaid EPS views cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Rubbermaid EPS views cut.

text.p: -- Salomon Bros analyst Carol Warner said in a research note that she cut her 1996 earnings view for Rubbermaid Inc to $1.19 per share from $1.25 and cut the 1997 view to $1.40 per share from $1.45.
-- "Increasing resin prices, combined with a significant downturn at Little Tikes, are the primary culprits." she said.

-- Her rating on the stock remains a "hold," although she said he recommends swapping into Newell Co "which recently posted a 23 percent increase in second quarter earnings and is on track to post very strong second half results."

-- Her Rubbermaid outlook is third quarter sales will be flat, "acquisitions will add to percent but negative pricing of two percent offsets that. Gross margins will be higher but so will SG&A as a percentage of sales. The results will be flat earnings in the third quarter of approximately $0.32 per share."
